capitalize.Description: Sets the first character of the given string to uppercase and the rest to lowercase.

title.Description: Sets the first character of each word in a given string to uppercase and the rest to lowercase.

isascii.Description: Returns true/false depending on whether the string only contains characters from the ASCII character set.

isalpha.Description: Returns true/false depending on whether the string only contains characters in the alphabet.

isalnum.Description: Returns true/false depending on whether the string only contains alphanumeric characters.

isdigit.Description: Returns true/false depending on whether the string only contains digits.

islower.Description: Returns true/false depending on whether the string is only lowercase.

isupper.Description: Returns true/false depending on whether the string is only uppercase.

startswith.Description: Returns true/false depending on whether string 'a' starts with substring 'b'

endswith.Description: Returns true/false depending on whether string 'a' ends with substring 'b'

random.Description: Returns a string of length len, with random characters that fall in the range min, max
